seller_description: Product details: MaterialYellow Gold, Metal type: Yellow Gold, Back Finding: Latch Back, Earring design: Hoop, Gem type: No Gemstone, Item type name: Earrings. About this item: These double huggie hoop earrings are have two different patterned hoops that measure 28mm long when linked together. Level up your ear stack with these Dangle Link Earrings that are crafted with 14K Yellow Gold Plating for long lasting brilliant finish. 60-DAY GUARANTEE Your happiness is our number one priority. To ensure your complete satisfaction, we offer a hassle-free 60-Day money-back guarantee. To get in touch, email or chat with us - a member of our team will be happy to help you. SUSTAINABILITY PAVOI is dedicated to sustainability throughout our entire product cycle. Our jewelry is made from 100  recycled materials and we package in 99  recycled and compostable materials. We work to reduce our carbon emissions and offset plastic consumption by removing 275,000 bottles from oceans annually. We are committed to maintain a balanced and eco-friendly business that minimizes our environmental impact. Trust that PAVOI is continuously working towards a greener future. PROUDLY AMERICAN-OWNED
review: I was SO excited to get me earrings UNTIL I REALIZED PAVOI SENT ME A COMPLETELY EMPTY BOX. How do you let this happen??? I don't even have an item to return to get my refund BECAUSE THEY NEVER SENT ME AN ITEM TO BEGIN WITH AND STILL CHARGED ME. Absolutely ridiculous.
expected-output: Seller's Description: The product is advertised as double huggie hoop earrings made of yellow gold-plated material with a latch back. The earrings are intended to provide a lasting, brilliant finish and come with a 60-day satisfaction guarantee, with a promise of sustainable practices. Seller's Image: The images showcase a pair of earrings with a sleek, double-hoop design in gold or rose gold plating, matching the description of the advertised item. Buyer's Image: The buyer's photo reveals the packaging with a PAVOI logo but lacks the actual product. It shows an empty jewelry box and accompanying materials, confirming the buyer’s claim of not receiving the item. Buyer's Review: The buyer expresses extreme dissatisfaction due to receiving an empty box without the earrings. They feel misled and charged without getting the product, with no item available to return for a refund. Discrepancies: The main discrepancy is the absence of the product in the buyer’s package. The seller’s description promises earrings, but the buyer only received an empty box, indicating a significant delivery or fulfillment error. Conclusion: The buyer is understandably dissatisfied because they did not receive the item. This issue is due to a fulfillment or packaging error on the seller’s part, leading to a failed customer experience and the need for resolution, ideally through a replacement or refund. " The seller is at fault due to a fulfillment or packaging error, as the buyer received an empty box instead of the earrings, leading to extreme dissatisfaction and a failed customer experience.
label: 0:Here seller is at fault
